snippet: Blair was disqualified from the Wells Fargo Championship in Charlotte, N.C., after hitting himself in the head with his putter — and then using the bent club to finish out the hole.
lead_paragraph: Blair was disqualified from the Wells Fargo Championship in Charlotte, N.C., after hitting himself in the head with his putter — and then using the bent club to finish out the hole.

headline.main: Zac Blair Makes Costly Hit to the Head
headline.print_headline: A Costly Hit to the Head
